Work.a1: I am a lecturer in the Department of Business Administration, Faculty of Liberal Arts and Management Sciences, Prince of Songkla University, Surat Thani Campus. I gave a lecture on the general business-related courses, including Business plan, Organization Management, Entrepreneur.
Work.a2: I work as a lecturer at the Department of Economics, Faculty of Liberal Arts and Management Sciences, Prince of Songkla University, Surat Thani Campus. I have given the lectures on Agricultural Economics, Managerial Economics, International Economics and Project Management, My expertise is Natural Resources Economics, Environmental Assessment, agricultural economics and management.
